channel.title: AccelerationX 728 Pking server, Hosted on VPS
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to AccelerationX! Website link : http://www.accelerationx.webs.com Forums link (Invision power board) : http://www.accelerationx.co.cc Client download link : http://www.mediafire.com/?qt2lg42mllq3wbl Webclient (Lil laggy cause of ram usage) : http://www.accelerationx.tk ----------------------------------------------------------- Staff list : Owner : Gucci Developer/Co-owner : Dikkekont Admin : Paddy Moderator : Harry --------------------------------------- Features : -Money pouch added -Shops readded -New Shop interface -High detail -Swithitemslook -New home -Friendly staff -Staff needed -VPS hosted 24/7 -Awesome Pk -Much more! Join now , AccelerationX Kind regards , Dikkekont[/center]
